title: Bloomberg Invest New York Summit
itunes:title: Bloomberg Invest New York Summit
description:
Carol broadcasts from Bloomberg Invest New York with Afsaneh Bechloss, CEO at Rock Creek, who discusses building a long-term portfolio. Jean Raby, CEO at Natixis Investment Managers, explains the future of active management. Heidi Ridley, CEO of Rosenberg Equities at AXA Investment Managers, talks about finding the tech edge. Jonathan Lavine, Co-Managing Partner at Bain Capital, shares how to learn for market cycles. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
